titleStmt.title: Here begynneth a lytel treatyse called the co[n]traverse bytwene a louer and a jaye lately compyled.
titleStmt.author: Feylde, Thomas.
Worde, Wynkyn de, d. 1534?

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Jmprynted at London in Flete strete at the sygne of the Sonne :

notesStmt.note: Title page contains ornamental border, and vignette showing a man conversing with a bird in a tree.
Date of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Contains illustrated t.p. and printer's device on p. [24].
"Thus endeth the treatyse of the louer and a Jaye, lately compyled by me Thomas Feylde"--p. 24.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
